Bible Book List

Discover the heart of Thanksgiving with our week-long devotional about biblical thankfulness.

Study This

1 Thessalonians 5:16-18

1 Thessalonians 42 Thessalonians 1

1 Thessalonians 5:16-18English Standard Version (ESV)

16 Rejoice always, 17 pray without ceasing, 18 give thanks in all circumstances; for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus for you.

Cross references:

  1. 1 Thessalonians 5:16 : Phil. 4:4
  2. 1 Thessalonians 5:17 : See Luke 18:1
  3. 1 Thessalonians 5:18 : See Eph. 5:20
English Standard Version (ESV)

The Holy Bible, English Standard Version Copyright © 2001 by Crossway Bibles, a division of Good News Publishers.
